Quest.Name: Four Heads are Better than None

CustomBehavior.Title: title
CustomBehavior.Text: Get on Zeppelin when it arrives and allow the story to finish. Hit Continue Profile when completed.

Pickup.QuestName: You Say You Want a Revolution

TurnIn.QuestName: You Say You Want a Revolution

CustomBehavior.Title: title
CustomBehavior.Text: Speak to 3 Dragonmaw Civilians and ask them to Fight with you. Hit Continue Profile when completed.

CustomBehavior.Title: title
CustomBehavior.Text: Wait while we defend the Shredder!

CustomBehavior.Title: title
CustomBehavior.Text: Kill 15 Stormtalons. Hit Eject and hit Continue Profile when complete.

CustomBehavior.Title: title
CustomBehavior.Text: Bot cannot Nav while on zeppelin. Please turn in and complete all quests while on zeppelin. Once finished, get off the zeppelin and hit continue profile.

CustomBehavior.Title: title
CustomBehavior.Text: Mount a Drake and then kill 8 Twilight Shadow Drakes. Hit Continue Profile when completed and cinematic is finished.

CustomBehavior.Title: title
CustomBehavior.Text: Slay 8 Obsidian Pyrewings after using the Wyrmhunter Hooks to reach them. Hit Continue Profile when finished.
